Package com.ecs.utils

Class Summary
Cache Utility class for adding and retrieving Stellent content items from the ECSBaseUtils Cache.
CastorXMLUtils Integration class for Castor XML and Oracle UCM
DBConnection The class contains a number of Database related utility methods.
DocUtils  
FileUtils The class contains a number of File & Properties related utility methods.
Globals Class containing all global constants used by the ECSBaseUtils package.
Log Log contains all the Logging methods you should use in custom code.
PreServiceFilter Attached to the afterInitLocale filter event, so the doFilter method is invoked at the start of every service call, after the user's locale has been resolved.
StartCheck The class contains a Stellent filter which should be invoked when the Stellent Content Server is first started.
StringUtils The class contains a number of String related utility methods.
Test  
XMLUtils The class contains a number of XML Dom related utility methods.
Zipper  
 

Exception Summary
ECSException The class implements an ECS specific exception which can be used in custom code for generating custom exceptions.
